text: What Will AI Flip Into? Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. text: Brutal Year for Stock Picking Spurs Trillion-Dollar Fund Exodus The last thing a diversified fund manager wants is to run a portfolio dominated by just seven technology companies — all American, all megacap, clustered in the same corner of the economy.
